overview:
Hanoi Sky Travel has now become one of the best tour operator in Vietnam and has successfully helped thousands of travelers realize their dream of traveling to Vietnam.HST provides customers with abundantly and detailed destination information, answers their questions and offers tailor-made high quality Vietnam travel services.

Whether you are planning a budget holiday or a luxury escape, Hanoi Sky Travel offer great value for money. Our Slogan: Trust us for your Holidays!

We provide the service as below: • Travel Package / holiday package in Vietnam ( inbound ): Hanoi tours, Halong bay cruise, Sapa tours, Mekong delta tours, … • Transportation arrangement ( airport pick up, charter service, day tour ) • Ticketing service • Visa application service Hanoi Sky Travel Head office: 27 Tong Duy Tan Street - Hoan Kiem District - Hanoi City - Vietnam Tel: (84-4) 39382236 Fax: (84-4) 39382237 Email: sales@hanoiskytravel.com http://www.hanoiskytravel.com http://www.vietnamtravellandscape.com

firm.name: Songhong Trading Service Joint Stock Company
